ComicInfo.Title: Takin' Care of Business; And One Got Away...; Dirty Politics; One-Two Punches; Clash of the Iron Clads; Simply Irresponsible
ComicInfo.Summary:
B.A. makes a trip to the gaming store.
Sara's boyfriend turns out to be a gamer also so she cancels game night with the Knights to game with him instead.
The gamers try a new game where they role-play presidential candidates.
Dave and Bob play Battleship.
Stevil and Weird Pete continue to play their henchman characters.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 17:16:14. [CVDB70334] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-14 06:55:57. [Issue ID 89653]
